data.name: label_DSLatency.ToolTip
data.value: Increasing the latency value slows down processing but reduces the PC's power consumption. Lowering the latency value increases PC power usage but makes processing smoother.

data.name: checkBox_EnableATRACPlayback.Text
data.value: Enable playback interface when loading ATRAC

data.name: comboBox_LPCASIODriver.ToolTip
data.value: Select an ASIO driver. If no valid drivers are available, the field will remain blank.

data.name: comboBox_LPCplayback.ToolTip
data.value: Specify the playback mode. DirectSound: The most common playback method; select this normally. WASAPI (Shared): Plays using WASAPI shared mode. Offers higher sound quality than DirectSound. WASAPI (Exclusive): Plays using WASAPI exclusive mode. Offers higher sound quality than DirectSound, but other system sounds will be inaudible while this option is used. This is by design and not a malfunction. ASIO: Requires a dedicated driver and compatible DAC for playback. Otherwise, the application will return an error.

data.name: checkBox_Subfolder.ToolTip
data.value: Creates a subfolder in the specified directory.

data.name: label_Usingthreads.Text
data.value: Number of threads used during playback:

data.name: checkBox_DisablePreviewWarning.ToolTip
data.value: When enabled, it disables the warning message that appears when encoded audio is read. However, to prevent mistakes, it is usually recommended to leave it disabled.

data.name: checkBox_DisablePreviewWarning.Text
data.value: Disable preview warning message when encoded audio is loaded

data.name: checkBox_ForceConvertWaveOnly.ToolTip
data.value: Forces the conversion process even when only Wave files are loaded. Normally, when only a Wave file is loaded, it is loaded directly into the application, but if this option is enabled, the conversion is forced before loading. This may be useful if you want to load and convert Wave files with different sample rates at the same time.

data.name: checkBox_Smoothsamples.ToolTip
data.value: Smoothes sample value updates during playback, but is CPU-intensive. Disabling it reduces CPU resources, but delays value updates. Disabling this option enables advanced settings such as playback buffer and latency in the ‘Advanced’ tab.

data.name: label_LPC_ASIODriver.Text
data.value: Select the driver to use with ASIO:

data.name: checkBox_Splashimg.ToolTip
data.value: Set your own splash screen image. JPG, PNG, or BMP format and must be 800x480 and 400x240 pixels.

data.name: checkBox_ForceConvertWaveOnly.Text
data.value: Force conversion even if only wave files are read

data.name: checkBox_Oldmode.ToolTip
data.value: Enable Legacy Mode. Enabling Legacy Mode uses older processing methods and allows the Loop Point Creator to operate independently. However, it is buggy and deprecated, so there is usually no need to enable Legacy Mode.

data.name: comboBox_LPCMultisourcePlaybackmode.Items2
data.value: ASIO (Low Latency, Compatible DAC, driver required)

data.name: checkBox_Hidesplash.ToolTip
data.value: Do not show the splash screen at startup. This may be useful when you want to speed up application startup.

data.name: label_Usingthreads.ToolTip
data.value: Adjust the number of threads to match your CPU. Lowering the value reduces CPU usage but may cause processing delays. Increasing the value improves smoothness but raises CPU usage.

data.name: label_DSBuffers.Text
data.value: Number of buffers when using DirectSound:

data.name: checkBox_Fixconvert.ToolTip
data.value: When converting a wave, the conversion format is always fixed. When this option is enabled, the format is not checked before conversion, and the conversion is always performed using the format specified here. This may be useful when the target to be used is predetermined.

data.name: checkBox_IO_SaveSourcesnest.Text
data.value: When loading and saving nested folders, save them using the same nesting structure as the source

data.name: checkBox_IO_SaveSourcesnest.ToolTip
data.value: Reads nested folder structures and saves them using the same nesting method as the source. This may be useful when processing source folders organized by item.

data.name: checkBox_EnableATRACPlayback.ToolTip
data.value: Enables the playback function when loading ATRAC format. When this function is enabled, the 'IO->Output to specified folder' function is not available.

data.name: comboBox_DSBuffers.ToolTip
data.value: Lowering the buffer value will cause processing delays but reduces your PC's power consumption. Increasing the buffer value uses more PC power but results in smoother processing.

data.name: checkBox_Smoothsamples.Text
data.value: Smooth sample value updates during playback

data.name: radioButton_nml.Text
data.value: Always ask for a save location

data.name: checkBox_ShowFolder.ToolTip
data.value: Opens the destination folder upon completion of the operation.

data.name: comboBox_DSLatencys.ToolTip
data.value: Increasing the latency value slows down processing but reduces the PC's power consumption. Lowering the latency value increases PC power usage but makes processing smoother.

data.name: comboBox_WASAPILatencysS.ToolTip
data.value: Increasing the latency value slows down processing but reduces the PC's power consumption. Lowering the latency value increases PC power usage but makes processing smoother.

data.name: comboBox_LPCMultisourcePlaybackmode.ToolTip
data.value: Specifies the playback mode when loading multichannel audio. WASAPI (Shared): Plays using WASAPI shared mode. Offers higher sound quality than DirectSound. WASAPI (Exclusive): Plays using WASAPI exclusive mode. Offers higher sound quality than DirectSound, but other system sounds will be inaudible while this option is in use. This is by design and not a malfunction. ASIO: Requires a dedicated driver and compatible DAC for playback. Otherwise, the application will return an error.

data.name: radioButton_nml.ToolTip
data.value: Specify the location each time when saving.

data.name: checkBox_SaveDeleteHzSuffix.ToolTip
data.value: Disables the addition of the Hz notation at the end of filenames when saving files. Removing the notation preserves the original filename, but makes it harder to identify the encoding method used. Use this option at your own discretion.

data.name: checkBox_Splashimg.Text
data.value: Set your own splash screen image:

data.name: comboBox_WASAPILatencysE.ToolTip
data.value: Increasing the latency value slows down processing but reduces the PC's power consumption. Lowering the latency value increases PC power usage but makes processing smoother.

data.name: radioButton_spc.ToolTip
data.value: Save the file in the specified location as a fixed location. If the 'General->Enable playback interface when loading ATRAC' option is enabled, this option will not work. (Applicable only during encoding operations)

data.name: checkBox_SaveDeleteHzSuffix.Text
data.value: Disable the Hz suffix appended to the end of filenames when saving files

data.name: checkBox_ATRACEncodeSource.Text
data.value: Load ATRAC as an encoding source

data.name: checkBox_MultisoundDontDS.ToolTip
data.value: Multi-channel audio is not supported for playback via DirectSound. Therefore, we strongly recommend enabling this option.

data.name: label_WASAPILatencyE.ToolTip
data.value: Increasing the latency value slows down processing but reduces the PC's power consumption. Lowering the latency value increases PC power usage but makes processing smoother.

data.name: checkBox_Checkupdate.ToolTip
data.value: Check for updates when the application is launched.

data.name: checkBox_Checkupdate.Text
data.value: Check for updates when launching applications

data.name: checkBox_FasterATRAC.Text
data.value: Perform immediate conversion when ATRAC is read

data.name: label_LPC_MultiplesourcePlaybackmode.Text
data.value: Playback modes for use with multichannel audio:

data.name: comboBox_LPCplayback.Items3
data.value: ASIO (Low Latency, Compatible DAC, driver required)

data.name: checkBox_FasterATRAC.ToolTip
data.value: Performs immediate conversion when ATRAC is read. If this option is enabled, the 'General->Enable playback interface when loading ATRAC' and 'Load ATRAC as an encoding source' option is ignored.

data.name: checkBox_Fixconvert.Text
data.value: Fixed output format for Wave conversion:

data.name: label_DSBuffers.ToolTip
data.value: Lowering the buffer value will cause processing delays but reduces your PC's power consumption. Increasing the buffer value uses more PC power but results in smoother processing.

data.name: label_WASAPILatencyS.ToolTip
data.value: Increasing the latency value slows down processing but reduces the PC's power consumption. Lowering the latency value increases PC power usage but makes processing smoother.

data.name: checkBox_MultisoundDontDS.Text
data.value: Always use WASAPI or ASIO when loading multichannel audio files

data.name: comboBox_PlaybackThreadCounts.ToolTip
data.value: Adjust the number of threads to match your CPU. Lowering the value reduces CPU usage but may cause processing delays. Increasing the value improves smoothness but raises CPU usage.

data.name: checkBox_ATRACEncodeSource.ToolTip
data.value: Load ATRAC as an encoding source. Enabling this option will disable ATRAC decoding. This may be useful when editing existing ATRAC files and converting them back to ATRAC format. This option is ignored when the ‘Enable playback interface when loading ATRAC’ option is enabled.
